div.p:
I coordinate the activities of a number managers in a variety of areas across the department.

I find GCDOCS really useful when I need to collaborate with colleagues from across the country.

For example, I am often called upon to set up meetings

with working groups who have representatives for every region in Canada.

GCDOCS allows me to create virtual workspaces so that we can instantly share

and collaborate on information that was presented during the meetings.

This has really made my life easier.

With the old way of working I would have to email documents from the meeting to all 50 working group members.

That means I would get 50 attachments coming back with all their comments.

And of course, this all had to be amalgamated back into one document for my Manager.

Now all I have to do is send a link to the document in our workspace

and have everyone add their comments to the one piece of information.

Easy!
